Verse: I'm Paul. I serve God. And Jesus Christ chose me to be his representative. Jesus Christ sent me to the people that God chose so that I would help them trust in him. And Jesus Christ sent me to those people so that I would help those people know things that are true. God caused me to do these things so that those people would please him.~!~(NP I ) (VP am ) (NP Paul ) . I pray that God, who is our Father, and Jesus Christ, who saves us from bad things and death, will treat you kindly.
